titleStmt.title: A further continuance of the Grand politick informer, discovering the wickednesse and mysteries of the present state iniquities on foot about the 14 of September 1653.
titleStmt.author: True friend to the publike interest.

notesStmt.note: The pagination and signing follow that of "The grand politike informer" by A true friend to the publike interest.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
